traits.Blood Frenzy: The shark has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.
traits.Magic Resistance: The shark has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
traits.Water Breathing: The shark can breathe only underwater.

actions.Multiattack: The shark makes two bite attacks.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) piercing damage.
